title: 材质包的音效如何修改
author: a1445303718
txt_content: 就比如撸方块的和打怪的音效

replies.author: 寒冰之刄
replies.txt_content:
音效路径：.\assets\minecraft\sounds
撸方块音效路径：.\assets\minecraft\sounds\dig
攻击音效路径：.\assets\minecraft\sounds\damage
文件夹中的ogg后辍英文文件名对应音效

replies.author: a1445303718
replies.txt_content:
